actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to extend the period for the payment of expenses of the temporary select committee on the committee system.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 127, 98th Congress, to extend the period, from December 15, 1984, to February 13, 1985, for the payment of expenses of the temporary select committee to study the Senate committee system.

titles.title: A resolution to extend the period for the payment of expenses of the temporary select committee on the committee system.
